data: TM AMB IVIG Fetal Neonatal Alloimmune Thrombocytopenia (F/NAIT Maternal) (Day of Treatment)
Confirm signed consent on chart for Transfusion of blood and/or blood products
Review the most current diet order for therapeutic requirements, food texture and fluid thickness. Add anything to be carried forward to the new Diet Order

Consultation with site Pathologist is available - contact TM
IVIG dose should not exceed 100 g/day. IVIG should be transfused over 2 days if dose exceeds 100 g or if transfusion is not well tolerated by the patient
If IVIG transfusion is required over 2 days, please place TM AMB IVIG Fetal Neonatal Alloimmune Thrombocytopenia (F/NAIT Maternal) q2day a week (Day of Treatment)
For patients with renal dysfunction or risk of renal dysfunction limit maximum rate to 0.2 g/kg/h
F/NAIT: Dose is 1 to 2 g/kg every week
